US & global politics, media, and current events; privacy & surveillance; tech self-reliance; the post-truth era; preparing for the coming cataclysm (as one does); and more.

Anti-authoritarian above all. Class realist.

I boost what's interesting, I don't agree with 100% of what I boost. If you try to interact with me and I don't respond (or respond 2 weeks late), please understand: life is short, and I'm trying to live it.
